description:
Kirika is Karin`s prince charming. She is Kirio`s twin sister. At first, she does not believe that Karin is a goddess, but comes to believe in it. Kirika is unwillingly forced to fight Karin because of the other Himeka and his brother Kirio. Later on the manga in Volumes 4 and 5, it is revealed to the protagonists that he is a girl. She gives help to Karin and Kazune when her father revives through her brother, Kirio.
In Goddess form, she is Nyx, the goddess that Kirio sent out in the first book to see if Karin was actually a goddess.
name: Karasuma Kirika
